short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TradeTape for Chrome saves you time and provides valuable insight by automatically recording when you are in an active trade.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TradeTape for Chrome saves you time and provides valuable insight by automatically recording when you are in an active trade on Tradovate. TradeTape gives you the power to review your saved clips automatically.
